Room.Name: Dante's Daggers and Darts Shoppe
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Dante's wonderful world of darts and daggers.
Room.LongDescription: No self-respecting thief or assassin would be caught dead without a good dagger or a couple of poisoned darts. These fantastic weapons are ideal for backstabbing and throwing. You have to watch Dante, though. he's been in business for ages, and knows how to con people out of a lot of money.
